# Today App - LLM Context File
# https://www.usetoday.space

## About Today
Today is a zero-maintenance, 100% offline journal application designed to help you think clearly without the burden of managing notes. Built for flow state and focused thinking.

## Core Philosophy
- One page per day, locked at midnight
- Immutable history - past entries cannot be edited after 24 hours
- Privacy-first - all data stored locally on your device
- Keyboard-first navigation with command palette (Cmd+K)
- No cloud sync, no accounts, no data collection

## Key Features
- Memory Rail: AI-powered contextual search that surfaces relevant past entries as you write
- Refactor Mode: Extract and organize thoughts into structured notes
- Voice Input: Dictate your thoughts seamlessly
- Markdown support with rich text formatting
- Dark mode optimized interface
- Cross-platform: Windows, macOS, Linux

## Target Users
- Individuals seeking a distraction-free journaling experience
- Knowledge workers who value privacy and offline-first tools
- People tired of complex note-taking systems
- Those who want to focus on thinking, not organizing

## Technical Details
- Desktop application built with Electron
- Local vector search for intelligent content surfacing
- No external API calls for core functionality
- Data stored in local SQLite database
